title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

04:45 <venkatesh> has joined #xwiki  
06:03 <sdumitriu> has quit  
06:50 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:08 <rrodriguez> has quit  
07:53 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:06 <pulasthi1> has joined #xwiki  
08:07 <@cjdelisle> good morning pulasthi1, sorry to hear you didn't get the internship.  
08:08 <pulasthi1> cjdelesle : hmm it seems so i was really looking forward to it  
08:08 <pulasthi1> cjdelesle : anyway i would still like to do the project  
08:09 <pulasthi1> cjdelesle : WDYT  
08:09 <@cjdelisle> You know you don't have to go through google to do something that will get you recognition. You can pick a project (it doesn't have to be XWiki but we would love to have you around) and it doesn't even have to be an existing project. Any code you write will help your experience and get your name out there.  
08:10 <@cjdelisle> That's great that you are interested in working on this.  
08:11 <pulasthi1> cjdelesle : asiri was intersted in the project and im hoping to do it with him  
08:11 <pulasthi1> cjdelesle : ill need some help from u too :)  
08:15 <@cjdelisle> Around when do you want to get started working on it and what kind of schedule are you thinking. It would be unfair to expect 10 hour days out of you with nothing but recognition in return.  
08:17 <pulasthi1> hmm well i have to talk with asiri also  
08:18 <pulasthi1> i think thats ok, i hope to start asap  
08:18 <@cjdelisle> Ok, I am trying to get some ground work layed for this project to be built upon.  
08:19 <pulasthi1> great ok ill get back to u after i talk with asiri :)  
08:19 <@cjdelisle> I have detemined that the DataNucleus Cassandra plugin needs some work before it will be fully functional and I am slowly working on understandign that code base.  
08:20 <pulasthi1> hmm still the non -indexed problem i assume  
08:21 <@cjdelisle> That is one issue. It \_should\_ work even without all columns being indexed.  
08:22 <@cjdelisle> The second issue is that it does not natively support JPQL.  
08:22 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:23 <@cjdelisle> DataNucleus makes adding JPQL support very easy and JPQL is very very similar to XWQL which means adding JPQL support allows us to cheat very badly at XWQL.  
08:24 <@cjdelisle> It should be almost as easy as running it through a regular expression.  
08:24 <pulasthi1> hmm :) great , hey i have to go got some work :). i will be back in the afternoon :)  
08:25 <pulasthi1> and ill talk with asiri too  
08:26 <@cjdelisle> Ok.  
08:26 <pulasthi1> has left #xwiki

10:32 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <vmassol> hey guys  
10:48 <vmassol> just remembered that today is release day!  
10:48 <vmassol> who's doing the 3.1 release? jvelociter: didn't you volunteered for it?  
10:48 <vmassol> s/volunteered/volunteer/  
10:48 <vmassol> (trying to remember)  
10:49 <vmassol> Denis: btw jetbrains agreed for a free license for us  
10:49 <vmassol> (I just had to modify the logo and instead put a banner on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Supporters )  
10:50 <vmassol> (she didn't buy my arguments though….I stopped the conversation because it was going nowhere… she thinks that Apache Maven is different from XWiki even though Sonatype offers commercial supports for Maven… anyway...)

15:21 <sbose78> :)  
15:23 <Chami1> has left #xwiki  
15:38 <vmassol> sbose78: have you sent an email on the users list?  
15:40 <sbose78> yes I have.  
15:44 <vmassol> ok cool, then you need to wait a bit…  :)  
15:46 <sbose78> How long approx. ?  :)  
15:49 <vmassol> not too long…  
15:51 <sbose78> how many weeks :)
